title: Spirit Walker Chronicles: The Awakening

world_building.setting: Modern Japan with hidden spirit realm overlay

magic_system.name: Spiritual Energy Manipulation
rules: Spirits exist parallel to physical world
Most humans cannot see or interact with spirits
Spirit walkers can cross between realms at will
Emotional state directly affects spiritual power
magic_system.power_source: Life force energy and emotional resonance
limitations: Overuse causes physical and mental exhaustion
Strong negative emotions can corrupt abilities
Cannot force spirits to obey, must earn cooperation

spirit_types.name: Guardian Spirits
spirit_types.description: Protective entities that guide spirit walkers
spirit_types.appearance: Animal forms with glowing eyes and ethereal aura

spirit_types.name: Lost Souls
spirit_types.description: Humans who died with unfinished business
spirit_types.appearance: Translucent human forms with emotional auras

spirit_types.name: Nature Spirits
spirit_types.description: Embodiments of natural elements and locations
spirit_types.appearance: Elemental forms that shift based on environment

spirit_types.name: Shadow Wraiths
spirit_types.description: Malevolent spirits that feed on negative emotions
spirit_types.appearance: Dark, shifting forms with red eyes

characters.name: Yuki Spiritwalker
characters.background: Ordinary high school student who awakens spirit sight after near-death experience
characters.personality: compassionate, determined, initially fearful but grows brave
characters.appearance: short black hair, traditional school uniform, spirit mark appears on forehead when powers active
characters.family: Lives with grandmother who secretly knows about spirit world

powers.name: Spirit Sight
powers.description: Can see and interact with spirits invisible to others
powers.visual_effect: glowing blue eyes with ethereal particles
powers.development: Starts weak, grows stronger with training and confidence

powers.name: Realm Walking
powers.description: Travel between physical and spirit worlds
powers.development: Initially accidental, learns to control with practice

powers.name: Spirit Communication
powers.description: Speak with and understand all types of spirits
powers.visual_effect: glowing aura around mouth when speaking to spirits
powers.development: Natural ability that improves with experience

characters.character_arc: From frightened teenager to confident protector of both worlds

characters.name: Kage the Shadow Guide
characters.background: Ancient wolf spirit bound to protect spirit walkers for centuries
characters.personality: wise, protective, mysterious past, dry sense of humor
characters.appearance: Large wolf made of shifting shadows with glowing silver eyes
abilities: Can manifest physically for short periods
Senses malevolent spirits from great distances
characters.relationship_to_protagonist: Reluctant mentor who becomes father figure

characters.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
characters.background: Yuki's childhood friend who notices her strange behavior
characters.appearance: tall, athletic, concerned expression, school uniform
characters.abilities: No spiritual powers but strong emotional support
characters.character_arc: From confused friend to trusted ally who helps bridge both worlds

characters.name: Grandmother Akemi
characters.background: Former spirit walker who gave up powers to live normal life
characters.personality: wise, caring, regretful about past choices
characters.appearance: Traditional elderly Japanese woman with knowing eyes
characters.secrets: Was powerful spirit walker in youth, knows about Yuki's destiny
characters.character_arc: From protective grandmother to revealed mentor

story_arcs.description: Yuki discovers her powers and learns about the spirit realm
Yuki's first major challenge protecting both worlds

panels.description: Yuki walking home from school on normal day, unaware of spirits around her
panels.narration: Some people say the world is exactly as we see it. Others know better.

panels.description: Yuki notices strange shadows moving in peripheral vision

dialogue.speaker: Yuki
dialogue.text: That's weird... I could have sworn I saw something move.

panels.description: Yuki trips and falls into busy street, truck approaching
Close-up of Yuki's terrified face as truck approaches
Mysterious force pushes Yuki to safety, first spirit sighting

dialogue.speaker: Kage
dialogue.text: Not yet, young one. Your journey is just beginning.

panels.description: Yuki on sidewalk, staring at where the wolf spirit was

dialogue.speaker: Yuki
dialogue.text: What... what was that? Did I imagine it?

visual_style_guide.character_design: Realistic proportions with expressive eyes and detailed emotions
visual_style_guide.spirit_effects: Translucent overlays with glowing edges and particle effects
visual_style_guide.backgrounds: Detailed modern Japanese settings with hidden supernatural elements
visual_style_guide.panel_layouts: Traditional manga flow with dynamic action sequences
visual_style_guide.tone_effects: Screen tones for atmosphere, white space for spiritual moments

themes: Coming of age and accepting responsibility
Balance between normal life and supernatural duty
The power of compassion and understanding
Family legacy and choosing your own path
